resource-agent.name: Delay
resource-agent.longdesc: This script is a test resource for introducing delay.

parameter.name: startdelay
parameter.longdesc: How long in seconds to delay on start operation.

parameter.name: stopdelay
parameter.longdesc: How long in seconds to delay on stop operation. Defaults to "startdelay" if unspecified.

parameter.name: mondelay
parameter.longdesc: How long in seconds to delay on monitor operation. Defaults to "startdelay" if unspecified.
